name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior IT Engineer with a robust skill set in **Azure**, **PowerShell**, **Microsoft 365**, **Microsoft Graph**, and **Intune**, adept at implementing **Conditional Access**, **DLP**, and compliance measures such as **RBAC**, **OAuth**, **OIDC**, and **SAML**. Proficient in utilizing **Microsoft Sentinel**, **Azure Policy**, and **Microsoft Purview** for advanced security and compliance management. Extensive experience in network fundamentals, eDiscovery, and insider risk mitigation. 

Bringing over 13 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, specializing in high-performance application development within healthcare and financial sectors. Highly skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in deploying cloud-native systems and implementing microservices architectures. Strong background in AI/ML-powered platforms, compliance-driven development, and MLOps with modern tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
